name: Pennsylvania Company, etc., et al. v. Clark et al., Appellants

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgments of the court below are affirmed on the opinion of Judge Alessandboni.

casebody.head_matter:
Pennsylvania Company, etc., et al. v. Clark et al., Appellants.
Argued November 26, 1940.
Before Schaefer, C. J., Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Patterson, JJ.
Alexander Conn, for appellants in No. 229-31 and appellees in Nos. 240-42.
Robert J. Callaghan, with him Clark, Kebard & Spahr, for appellants in Nos. 235-37, and appellees in Nos. 229-231.
Sylvan K. Kirsch, of Sundheim, Folz & Kirsch, with him Allen J. Levin, for appellant, in Nos. 240-242.

January 6, 1941:
